post.body: no, it's a citrus fruit. is Absolut Citron poison flavoured vodka?
honey, sugar, flour, citron, almonds, vanilla....yummy stuff!
no - i don't think that's true. but i *am* tweeting on xmas eve...while i bake for tomorrow.
:-( i'm all out. sadness.
wow...you're hittin' all the boats tonight! you're so close i can see you! (ok, not really - but you are just a town over!
@prettyemily thank you for the concern - she's bleeding through her stomach *again*....i'm not sure exactly how serious it is.
why wasn't i invited? ;-) i just got home from work and had a lunchmeat and potato chip sandwich. yum. :-/
that's more xmas dinner than i'm getting!
yay!! warm fuzzies!
i see. it does. you're not a total copycat then!
i don't like the idea of giving ADHD meds to kids. i take adderall though-don't have the hyperactivity, but do have the rest of it
Lebkuchen fresh out of the oven! - Photo: http://bkite.com/03dkh
My prize from @gemaffair! TY katy! - Photo: http://bkite.com/03djI
Merry Christmas! Happy (5th day of)Hannukah! Happy Children's Constitution&Family Day, Quaid-e-Azam! Joyeaux Fete de Membres!& any i forgot
about to put the lebkuchen into the oven. then to start some dough and a little knitting before bed.
messed up the first batch of fudge - but got good idea from recipezaar forum - turn too-soft fudge into truffles! think i'll give it a try!
Pfeffernuesse dough made! - Photo: http://bkite.com/03dce
i'm all ready to finish my xmas baking - hope you don't mind my state of undress. ;-) - Photo: http://bkite.com/03d5X
Just found out my grandma is in the emergency room. Don't have a good feeling about this!
So @wbotts said i received the jewelry i won from @gemaffair 's xmas giveaway! Can't wait to get home to try it on!
